item.title: About
item.description: Júlio is a Computer Engineer based on São Paulo, Brazil. He has being working with Open Source solutions and GNU/Linux systems since 2008. All started around 2005, during high-school, when he was attending a basic course of informatics and fall for two great areas of technologies: Network and Operational Systems. At a class extra class he was presented to a Debian 4.0 Etch system, which became your main distribution since.
